unnormalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Hunting Just Got Easier!
normalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Hunting Just Got Easier!

unnormalised: Tired of sifting through endless websites for that perfect scholarship? Well, worry no more! New scholarship portals are popping up faster than you can say "IIT entrance exam," making finding financial aid a total breeze.
normalised: Tired of sifting through endless websites for that perfect scholarship? Well, worry no more! New scholarship portals are popping up faster than you can say "I I T entrance exam," making finding financial aid a total breeze.

unnormalised: These EdTech platforms, like "Vidya Dhan" and "Siksha Sahayak," are acting like digital pandits, matching you with scholarships based on your profile. Think of it as matrimonial sites, but for your education!
normalised: These EdTech platforms, like "Vidya Dhan" and "Siksha Sahayak," are acting like digital pandits, matching you with scholarships based on your profile. Think of it as matrimonial sites, but for your education!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from Delhi University says, "These portals are a boon. Students in even remote areas like, say, Bastar, can now access opportunities they wouldn't have known about otherwise."
normalised: Doctor Sharma from Delhi University says, "These portals are a boon. Students in even remote areas like, say, Bastar, can now access opportunities they wouldn't have known about otherwise."

unnormalised: They offer everything from merit-based scholarships to ones for specific communities or courses (like that obscure Sanskrit literature grant you’ve been eyeing!). Some even offer mentorship & guidance – a total "guru-shishya parampara" vibe in the digital age!
normalised: They offer everything from merit-based scholarships to ones for specific communities or courses (like that obscure Sanskrit literature grant you've been eyeing!). Some even offer mentorship and guidance – a total "guru-shishya parampara" vibe in the digital age!

unnormalised: Just remember to double-check the deadlines and eligibility criteria - kyunki babu, applying is one thing, getting it is another! Many sites also need documents like Aadhaar and marksheets so keep them handy.
normalised: Just remember to double-check the deadlines and eligibility criteria - kyunki babu, applying is one thing, getting it is another! Many sites also need documents like Aadhaar and marksheets so keep them handy.

unnormalised: These platforms also boast user-friendly interfaces (no more confusing government website layouts!) and advanced search filters. Finding Rs. 50,000 for your MBA, or a scholarship covering living expenses for a year in Bangalore, just became way less daunting. These portals occupy only a few sq ft in your device but pack a punch! Go, get that scholarship!
normalised: These platforms also boast user-friendly interfaces (no more confusing government website layouts!) and advanced search filters. Finding rupee fifty thousand for your M B A, or a scholarship covering living expenses for a year in Bangalore, just became way less daunting. These portals occupy only a few square feet in your device but pack a punch! Go, get that scholarship!
